tags: y'all gotta give him a break
smh why are they a couple
body:
Tom and Harry’s vows probably

Harry: even though you’re an impudent fool who is such a scaredy cat when it comes to death, I still love you. And please, stop talking about your plans for the Wizarding World while we eat dinner, it’s unnerving.

Tom: well we have different morals you little shit. I still don’t know what in Merlin’s name made me fall for you.

Lucius, the priest: why are these two even a bloody couple?

summary: A Vans Anunciou Uma Coleção 'Harry Potter' Para Breve
title: A Vans Anunciou Uma Coleção 'Harry Potter' Para Breve
body:
A VANS usou suas redes sociais em todo o mundo para anunciar a chegada breve de uma coleção inspirada pelo universo fantástico de HARRY POTTER. Sem detalhes adicionais, além do logo especialmente criado para o projeto, a imagem animada foi legendada com o endereço do site em que estão representadas as quatro casas de Hogwarts, …

A Vans Anunciou Uma Coleção ‘Harry Potter’ Para Breve foi originalmente publicado no SneakersBR

Leia o post na íntegra no SneakersBR

Harry Potter Confessions collects confessions from fans around tumblr who have something they'd like to say. please read the RULES before clicking below.

we are accepting all confessions at this time

Ask Box is OPEN - - - Submitting is OPEN

summary: It bothers me to see people badmouth JKR for identifying Dumbledore as gay without writing his sexuality into the books, for two...
caption: It bothers me to see people badmouth JKR for identifying Dumbledore as gay without writing his sexuality into the books, for two reasons. One, it seems to me that Dumbledore was always coded as gay, especially in the first book in the description of his clothes - I know I always read him so and it seemed pretty cool for it to not be a big deal. Two, the books are written from Harry’s point of view, and he’s a fairly self-absorbed kid who doesn’t take much interest in anyone’s sexuality really.

reblog.comment: It bothers me to see people badmouth JKR for identifying Dumbledore as gay without writing his sexuality into the books, for two reasons. One, it seems to me that Dumbledore was always coded as gay, especially in the first book in the description of his clothes - I know I always read him so and it seemed pretty cool for it to not be a big deal. Two, the books are written from Harry’s point of view, and he’s a fairly self-absorbed kid who doesn’t take much interest in anyone’s sexuality really.

trail.content_raw: It bothers me to see people badmouth JKR for identifying Dumbledore as gay without writing his sexuality into the books, for two reasons. One, it seems to me that Dumbledore was always coded as gay, especially in the first book in the description of his clothes - I know I always read him so and it seemed pretty cool for it to not be a big deal. Two, the books are written from Harry’s point of view, and he’s a fairly self-absorbed kid who doesn’t take much interest in anyone’s sexuality really.
trail.content: It bothers me to see people badmouth JKR for identifying Dumbledore as gay without writing his sexuality into the books, for two reasons. One, it seems to me that Dumbledore was always coded as gay, especially in the first book in the description of his clothes - I know I always read him so and it seemed pretty cool for it to not be a big deal. Two, the books are written from Harry’s point of view, and he’s a fairly self-absorbed kid who doesn’t take much interest in anyone’s sexuality really.

blog.name: little-marauders
blog.title: Hey little wizards
blog.description:
| Lya | 15 | Gryffindor | She | French |
Harry Potter, Walking Dead, Teen Wolf, Shadowhunters

summary: Preference Marauders : How they react when they saw you for the first time
title: Preference Marauders : How they react when they saw you for the first time
body:
James : It was at a party the Gryffindors had organized to celebrate the Gryffindor Quidditch victory over Slytherin. Remus invited you for you not to be alone and so that you could have fun and change your mind. James didn’t look away from you when you entered in the lions common room with Remus.

- “Who is she ?” - Ask Sirius

- “I don’t know but she’s cute.” - Say James with a smile

Sirius : It was on a moonlit evening, you were also a werewolf because you were bitten at the same time as your brother, Remus. You then accompanied the Marauders to the screaming hut during your 5th year. You then sympathize with Sirius just before your transformation.

- “I’m Sirius Black, or Padfoot, like you want. You must be (Y/N), the sister of Moony.”

Remus : It was in the big room while you were being pissed off by Malfoy and Bellatrix, Remus saw you in a bad position and came to your help, followed by your brother, James. He smiled as he heard you laugh as Malfoy ended up with pink candy hair.

- “Get off Malfoy. She didn’t do anything over you so leave her alone.”

Peter : It was in your sixth year and you were new to Hogwarts. You were looking for an empty compartment in the train, but you did not look where you were going and you slammed it in without doing it on purpose, causing both of you to fall on you. You apologized quickly, red like a tomato and went away while the Marauders teased Peter, who was looking at you from behind, his cheeks red.

- “Uh…I’m so sorry ! Sorry…Sorry…”

- “Hum…It’s nothing…Don’t worry…”

Lily : It was in the library, you were looking for a book in particular but Remus informed you that it was Lily who held the book. Luckily, she was also at the library a few tables next to you. You approached her and asked her if she had finished reading until she offered to read the book with her. You agreed, but instead of reading, you talked for two hours.

- “Oh hum…Sorry if you want this book. We can read it both ?”

Marlene : It was during the summer holidays before your sixth year, your sister, Molly, who was at Hogwarts three years ago and aged 21, had given birth to Bill. Marlene, who was a very good friend of your sister, came to visit her at the hospital on your day of visit. So you talked while Molly was slepped.

- “I didn’t know it was your day. Hum…I’m Marlene. Marlene McKinnon. You must be (Y/N).”

Mary : It was during a Quidditch practice, you were a chaser on the team and you gave it your all. As you reached the locker room, you saw Mary, leaning against a low wall in front of the field, who was looking at you with a smiling corner. She congratulated you on the training and you went to the locker room with a smile on your lips.

- “You’re very talentued (Y/N). I’m Mary McDonald.”

Severus : It was after the Christmas ball of your sixth year and you had just seen your boyfriend kissed Bellatrix. You then took refuge on a tree branch and Severus, who, for some unknown reason, felt bad about your uneasiness, followed you. He climbed into the tree and a silence slipped between you as you shared a cigarette. You then confided in him and he listened to you without a word.

- “Sorry for…what happened to you…”

Regulus : It was your first year for both of you. It was your first day and for a magical creature care class, you had to get duet. He then approached you and asked you if you wanted to team up with him, which you accepted with a smile, although he was in Slytherin and you in Gryffindor.

- “Hello…Hum…Can we…be together for the class ? I didn’t have anyone…”

summary: Nothing in the world will ever beat the feeling of making yourself an entire meal, using the restroom, and watching/reading a...
body: Nothing in the world will ever beat the feeling of making yourself an entire meal, using the restroom, and watching/reading a series all while it’s the middle of the night and you didn’t wake anyone up.

summary: God, who looked like Dumbledore, told Jesus, who looked like Harry Potter, to wait for him on the dock because he had to jump...
body: God, who looked like Dumbledore, told Jesus, who looked like Harry Potter, to wait for him on the dock because he had to jump into the lake to talk to one of the Lake People. For some reason, Jesus jumped in a few minutes after him and the Lake Person said, pointing behind God, “Umm…Jesus just jumped in.” And God said, “Je-who??” Then turned to see his son drowning. “Je-SUS!” Then I woke up.

reblog.comment: God, who looked like Dumbledore, told Jesus, who looked like Harry Potter, to wait for him on the dock because he had to jump into the lake to talk to one of the Lake People. summary:
Lily: We will be fine! And one day we’ll laugh about this with our grandchildren. 
James: Our grandchildren? 
Lily: Our...
body:
Lily: We will be fine! And one day we’ll laugh about this with our grandchildren.

James: Our grandchildren?

Lily: Our respective grandchildren. Probably made with other people.

James: Probably?

blog.description: My name’s Charlie, and I’mma be putting my HP headcanons and stuff on here (and possibly oneshots). If you’ve got any requests, just send an ask!

Ella•Hufflepuff with Slytherin tendencies•fangirl af

One day my life will not revolve around fictional characters. Today is not that day

blog.name: ununquadius
blog.title: Drarry Chats (Mostly)
blog.description: AO3: ununquadius  // Follows, comments and likes from azaharperezoso Feel free to correct my mistakes, English is not my first language | Header by @cubedcoffeecake

summary: Harry: I want you to kiss me. Hurry up! Draco: What? Why would I kiss you, Potter? Harry: Ron’s looking and I want to make him...
body:
Harry: I want you to kiss me. Hurry up!

Draco: What? Why would I kiss you, Potter?

Harry: Ron’s looking and I want to make him uncomfortable. Come on, kiss me

Draco: Okay, but only to make Weasley uncomfortable

Harry: Of course

Inspired by rockmarina’s prompt list

summary: JK Rowling: there was actually a character in the Prisoner of Azkaban that was never mentioned throughout the whole book and I...
body: JK Rowling: there was actually a character in the Prisoner of Azkaban that was never mentioned throughout the whole book and I didn’t even give the person a name, who was a non-binary Muslim whose mothers were gay and–

blog.description: I have some pretty bizarre dreams, and it’d be nice to have a place to store them. I also need to stop texting my friend every weird dream I have...

summary: I once dreamt that the Harry Potter movies had alternate scenes you could watch with various endings on who he'd end up with by...
body: I once dreamt that the Harry Potter movies had alternate scenes you could watch with various endings on who he’d end up with by the end of the films.
